system.effect:
Trigger: You use a Prism Move
Effect: The effect of this Feature depends on the Triggering Move. You may only use Prismatic Alignment with each Move once per Scene.
- Flash: Flash also Blinds all targets it hits until the end of their next turn.
- Swift: Swift instead has a range of 8, 3 Targets.
- Tri-Attack: Roll twice for Tri-Attack’s Accuracy Roll and take the better result. If you trigger its Effect Range, you may choose the effect instead of rolling for it.
- Weather Ball: You use Weather Ball as if you were in the Weather of your choice.
- Hyper Beam: Hyper Beam instead has a Range of Burst 2, Smite or 10, Ranged Blast 3, Smite.
- Morning Sun: You use Morning Sun as if you were in Sunny Weather, and you may cure yourself of one Status Affliction.
system.name: Prismatic Alignment [CR]
